translations: v.（使）合并，（使）融合；渐渐消失于，融入；兼并（产权，产业）

phrs.translation: 融入（车流中）；与…结合；于…联合

sentences.sentence: His department will merge with mine.
sentences.translation: 他的部门将和我的合并。

sentences.sentence: The banks are set to merge next year.
sentences.translation: 这几家银行准备明年合并。

sentences.sentence: A proposal to merge the two companies was voted through yesterday.
sentences.translation: 两家公司合并的建议已于昨日投票通过。
